attributes.comment:
USCIS-2006-0044-0001 - Adjustment of the Immigration and Naturalization Benefit
Application and Petition Fee Schedule

I oppose the substantial increases propsed, in specific to adoption related
immigration forms. The necessity to increase the processing fees, as high as
proposed, for such forms is not warranted. Understanding that expenses for such
servies will rise, due to inflation, the proposed percentage increase of over 60%
well exceeds the cost of inflation related increases.

Costs are expected to increase, but at a more realistic percentage for the service
levels provided.

Please reconsider the proposed increases for adoption related expenses.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Francis Guthrie
